title: Profile
emptyFollowers: You don't have any followers yet

catches.addFirstCatch: Tap the '+' button to share your first catch

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.description: Update your profile information to help others know more about you.

equipment.title: Gear
equipment.noEquipment: You haven't added any gear yet

equipment.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this gear?

spots.noSpots: You haven't added any spots yet

findFriends.findInContactsDesc: Discover which of your contacts are already on Fishivo
findFriends.inviteFriendsDesc: Invite your fishing buddies to join Fishivo

permission.title: Find Friends
permission.description: We need access to your contacts to find friends who are on Fishivo. Your phone numbers are securely encrypted and never stored.
permission.skipMessage: Without contacts permission, you can only see general friend suggestions.
permission.requiredMessage: We need contacts permission to find your friends. You can grant it in Settings.

findFriends.inviteMessage: Hey! I'm sharing my fishing experiences on Fishivo. Join me: https://fishivo.com/download
findFriends.noContactUsersSubtitle: You can always search for users with similar interests

suggestions.title: No suggestions yet
suggestions.description: We don't have any friend suggestions for you right now. Check back later.

requests.title: No requests
requests.description: You don't have any pending friend requests right now.

empty.inviteDescription: Invite your friends to Fishivo and share your fishing experiences together

share.title: Share Profile
share.qrDescription: Share your QR code so others can follow you
share.qrError: Error creating QR code. Please try again.
share.qrSaveError: Failed to save QR code. Please try again.
share.galleryPermissionMessage: Permission required to save QR code to gallery
share.scanQRMessage: QR code scanning feature will be added soon!

blockedUsers.title: Blocked Users
blockedUsers.emptyStateDescription: You haven't blocked any users yet. Blocked users will appear here.
blockedUsers.infoText: Blocked users cannot send you messages, follow you, or see your posts.
blockedUsers.unblockConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to unblock {{name}}?
